item.title: How?! [317]
item.dc:creator: @i_lex_50_i i lex 50 i
item.description:
@i_lex_50_i wrote:

Guys, I need help displaying a quest interface when doing ::commands

I’m using the Project Insanity base btw

So far I’ve only got:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Commands")) { c.sendMessage("@dbl@Public commands@bla@: ::players, ::changepassword #password#, ::resetatt - resets your attack,"); c.sendMessage("::resetdef - resets your defence, ::resetstr - resets your strength,"); c.sendMessage("::resethp - resets your hitpoints,::resetrng - resets your ranged, ::resetpray - resets your prayer,"); c.sendMessage("::resetmage - resets your magic,");

it just gets too messy, so I really need help

Read full topic
